attributes.action: Ban meat in the United Kingdom - Make the UK Vegetarian
attributes.additional_details:
This petition calls on the government to issue to total ban on the killing of innocent animals for food production.

The meat industry is inhumane and is one of the chief causes of environmental degradation.

850 million animals are killed each year in the UK for food, this petition calls on this number to be 0 and to make a vegetarian society.
